data.persona: I am second to god. I have a halo. I have wings. My harp breaks eyes.
data.description:
You are in the waterfall.
Near the top of the mountain is a beautiful waterfall. It falls down many many feet to a beautiful lake. It is very loud and very majestic. It sparkles in the sun.
There's a pot of gold here.
The midget is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a halo and a wing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the midget off the waterfall.
data.mid_motivation: I am friends with the midget, and I think it would be funny to knock him over the edge.
data.long_motivation: I like to cause mischief and aggravate my celestial friends.
